allOf.title: mc_control::fsm::MetaTasksState
allOf.description: Create and run multiple tasks until their completion criteria is reached

tasks.description: Keys are the name of the tasks and values are MetaTask objects with an optional completion criteria

outputs.description:
List of tasks names from which the completion criteria will be used to generate the state's output.
  • output="OK" if empty
  • Otherwise the output will be of the form "Taks1=citeria1, Task2=criteria2..." where "criteria1" and "criteria2" correspond to the output string of the tasks' completion criteria (e.g. "timeout AND speed").
